sentences.english: This white porcelain ewer , or pouring vessel, is considered to be the among the most remarkable of all Chinese ceramics.
sentences.chinese: 此白色大口水罐，或称壶，被认为是中国陶瓷的标志。

sentences.english: This is the essential thesis of molecular genetics, sometimes called the central dogma .
sentences.chinese: 这就是分子遗传学的基本论点，或称中心法则。

sentences.english: Yuzhuan, also called "Zhuanyu", is an important category of traditional Chinese linguistics.
sentences.chinese: 语转，或称“转语”，是传统小学中的一个重要范畴。

sentences.english: A way around the problem is something called an induced pluripotent stem cell, or iPS.
sentences.chinese: 解决此问题可借助于诱导多能干细胞，或称iPS。

sentences.english: Official documents generally can be called amanuensis materials or files.
sentences.chinese: 公文又统称文书材料，或称文件。

sentences.english: "A clean room"or"a white room", increasingly becomes shop talk.
sentences.chinese: “清洁室”或称“白室”，正日益变成专家们的行话。

sentences.english: Often the latifundia are surrounded by privately-owned small plots or minifundia.
sentences.chinese: 大庄园经常被私人所有的小地块或称小庄园所包围。

sentences.english: There lived a great thane, or lord, called macbeth .
sentences.chinese: 有一个显赫的爵士，或称贵族，名叫麦克白。

sentences.english: Majority of proteins in organisms are existed in a modulation of glycoprotein, also named glycoconjugates.
sentences.chinese: 机体的蛋白质大多以糖蛋白或称糖复合物的形式存在。

sentences.english: The Lenten Rose, or Helleborus orientalis.
sentences.chinese: 四旬斋玫瑰，，或称东方嚏根草。

sentences.english: A series of collapse craters, or calderas, lie at its summit.
sentences.chinese: 其顶端有一系列崩塌的火山口，或称火山臼。

sentences.english: The drum sieve, tamis, is used in France when one is instructed to force food through a sieve.
sentences.chinese: 筛东西的时候法国人最常用的是筒筛，或称细网筛。

definition: also known as/alternative name/to also be called
to be generally referred to (as)/generic term
... hence the name (used at the end of a sentence)
to be collectively called/collective term/general designation
namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near
to be called/to be known as
to make a general reference/to be used in a general sense
to be considered to be/to be defined to be/to be called
old term/old way of referring to sth
